wordpressPost.title: Lana Del Rey to headline Øya
wordpressPost.content:
This will be Lana Del Rey’s only concert in Norway this year, and the first since 2014. Lana del Rey is a legend in the making. The latest singles, Love and Lust For Life, are setting precedent for the upcoming album with a new mood of optimism and humanism ready to change and empower a new generation. We’re looking forward to an emotional concert with sentimental melodies, and most likely quite a few songs from her upcoming album.

Currently, most of the artists are booked and placed on days, but we’re still waiting for some confirmations, so expect news on this in the coming weeks.

 

The tickets sell at an impressive pace, so don’t hesitate, make sure you get to experience Lana conquer the Norwegian night in Tøyenparken.

ABOUT LANA DEL REY
